attributes.action: Give all Military Police the same powers and regulations as civilian police
attributes.additional_details:
Petition for the relevant Government department to provide any and all Military Police (MP) service personnel the exact same powers as Civilian police constables.

This should apply to all previous and future acts of Parliament unless otherwise stated.

This will allow for the modernisation of the Military police bringing it into line with any future needs of the country.

With an increasingly over stretched civilian police and shrinking military, the MP could be a useful tool in the fight against crime if ever required off base.

The powers should be bestowed upon the new MP by a member of the judiciary.
